IP = 192.192.1.1/22
Classe = C
11000000.11000000.00000001.00000001
CIDR = 22
Host = 1.1
Gateway convenzionale = 192.192.1.2
Subnet Mask = 255.255.252.0
// 11111111.11111111.11111100.00000000
11111111.11111111.111111 // Bloccati i primi 22 bit
Ip Network =  192.192.0.0
AND
// 11000000.11000000.00000001.00000001
// 11111111.11111111.11111100.00000000
// 11000000.11000000.00000000.00000000 =  192.192.0.0
OR
// 11000000.11000000.00000001.00000001
// 11000000.11000000.00000010.11111110
// // 11000000.11000000.00000011.11111111 = 192.192.3.255

Numeri di Host disponibili = 
256 – 252 = 4
4 * 256 = 1024 – 2 = 1022
